Text: Beerfest is never really funny - it's a typical american highschool movie about some guy going to at beer drinking contest. The plot, humour and the jokes are archtypical american. Not good...
no need to bitch at me.... I thought the movie was very funny. If you dont agree thats fine. Dont Dl it if ur gonna bitch about it... :P
This movie is great :D, But plz seed
